mainText:
I would like to wish the best to Steve's family and all people on Apple...
We have lost a huge part of this world, this world that could't be this
without his creations... I'm really sorry... I always loved Steve's
creations... I always followed him from here... I will remember
him and his quotes... for ever
Thanks Steve! Thanks for all wonderfull things that you have bring to our
lifes...
author: Bibo
